name: OOSOCIAL
overview:
OOSOCIAL is a social media and technologies consultancy which devises, creates, builds and delivers leading edge social media marketing and communication strategies.

We work with brands to help them understand and implement relevant social media strategies.

OOSOCIAL designs and develops native Facebook applications and fan pages, viral web widgets/micro sites, desktop applications, mobile applications (iPhone, Blackberry, Nokia, Android) and delivers CPE/CPI seeding solutions and online PR services.

Our current clients include the BBC, BSkyB, Chelsea FC, Channel 4, EMI, Warner Music, Totaljobs, Speedo, Comcast, the R & A, Haymarket Publishing, GTECH and a host of others.
